channel.title: Things that don't work...
channel.description:
I am in Office Complex right now. 1. Upstairs, after a serious firefight, behind a barricated door I find two surviving scientist, I just killed the male one.... and the female one didn't care, she joined me when I asked her right after. 2. There is that scientist with some basic radio device under a stairway (after that serious firefight place) ... in HL he says "I just overheard a secure access transmission: soldiers have arrived and they're coming to rescue us" - [i]Here he does some explaining moves, but remains silent. He doesn't say a thing.[/i] 3.. Towards the end of the chapter, in the freezer room, I can't close any of the doors inside there. The handles do give an operating sound, but nothing happens.
Sorry, co-ordinates come later.

item.title: Things that don't work...
item.dc:creator: kaksikasvoinen
item.description:
Yes, the female scientist tends to ignore team kills, it was sort of funny at the final elevator shaft, where I decided to test few things, and killed all the four surviving guards I had with me in front of her. She kindly reminded me to reload, and was wondering would I need more ammo soon.

Also, the male scientist ignores grenades after sequence has started, other NPC :s seem to react regardless of the script, this is a minor thing though.

I didn’t personally have any other issues reported by Medkit, few others minor tweaks there were, like cockroaches going wild on certain solids, and some ragdoll wtf moments.

I still enjoyed every god damn minute.
